meanings.definition: Not written with an initial capital letter.
meanings.sent1: The uncapitalized word looked different from the others.
meanings.sent2: She preferred to write her name uncapitalized.
meanings.sent3: The uncapitalized letter felt left out among its capitalized friends.
meanings.sent4: Her uncapitalized signature stood out on the official document.
meanings.sent5: The uncapitalized title on the book cover caught her eye.

meanings.definition: To remove the capital letter from.
meanings.sent1: He uncapitalized the first letter of the sentence.
meanings.sent2: Remember to uncapitalized the proper nouns in the text.
meanings.sent3: She accidentally uncapitalized her name on the form.
meanings.sent4: The software can uncapitalized all the headings with one click.
meanings.sent5: He decided to uncapitalized the entire document for a casual look.
